long_description: The Black Diamond Blizzard holster securely stashes ice tools or screws on your climbing harness. Stiffened pocket is flared, making an easy-to-hit target; deep enough to hold a tool firmly. Pocket is big enough (2.5 in. diameter) to hold 2 tools in a pinch, yet small enough to prevent small-headed tools from falling through. Works easily on most harnesses with waistbands 3 in. wide or less.
short_description: The Black Diamond Blizzard holster securely stashes ice tools or screws on your climbing harness.
